fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.applicationvm.application

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.applicationvm.application.Application
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, RequestNotificationControllerHandlerI

    public class Application
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements RequestNotificationControllerHandlerI
    The Application component is defined by the RequestGenerator component. In order to deploy an application in the data center, the component must send a request through its OutboundApplicationport indicating the number of ApplicationVM and the number of Core needed for the deployment. If it receives a notification from the AdmissionController, it retrieves the RequestsubmissionDispatcher URI to connect it with the RequestSubmissionOutboundPort RequestGenerator Port. At the end of this step, the RequestGenerator connects with the Component and the Application is deployed in the Data Center.

    Description

    Invariant 

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2014-03-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant, Salammbo
